p: However, the EAF of O. gratissimum repelled Ae. aegypti at 100% till 150 min and decreased to 91% after 180 min. Meanwhile, the total protection of L. camara EAF and the mixed EAF of the two plants was 60 and 30 min, respectively, which may be a possible antagonistic action of EAF between O. gratissimum and L. camara to repel female Ae. aegypti (Table 1).
